verses.text: \w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*. \w Before|strong="H5048"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gods,\f + \fr 138:1 \ft The word elohim, used here, usually means “God” but can also mean “gods”, “princes”, or “angels”.\f* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.
